Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £40, 2nd £30, 3rd £20. 11 bands competed,
Jan. 7, 2015, 7:56 p.m. June 22, 2016, 3:24 p.m.
